nodes.bodyText: Why not just add "return clazz == Numeric.class" to canConvert in ClientTypes?  Is there a case where ClientTypes is a BIT, CHAR or LONGVARCHAR and you want to return a Numeric class only if it is not one of those types?
right, the other types like CHAR, LONGVARCHAR, DATE, TIME, (and in the future BLOB and CLOB) won't be convertable to Numeric
Should we add a check to make sure the passed in i >= 0?  Or are we guaranteed a value that is 0+
Good catch, I think this method will eventually be an SPI so I'll add the check in a follow-on PR
